document.full_text: negotiations for the release of more than a dozen people kidnapped by a tribal gang in the remote southern philippines stalled sunday, and police said two hostages sent to get water and medicine would not return to the group.
document.title: talks stall for hostage release in south philippines
lines_and_colors: negotiations for the release of more than a dozen people kidnapped by a tribal gang in the remote southern philippines stalled sunday, and police said two hostages sent to get water and medicine would not return to the group.
